title: Spread Awareness | Mabuwaya Foundation
heading: Spread Awareness
intro: Help us spread the word about conserving the Philippine crocodile and protecting biodiversity in the Philippines. Your voice matters!

cards.title: Advocate
cards.text: Share information about the Philippine crocodile and its habitats on social media and in your community.

cards.title: Engage
cards.text: Join campaigns and events that raise awareness on wildlife protection and sustainable living.

cards.title: Share
cards.text: Promote our advocacy by sharing our posts, videos, and stories with your friends and family.
